html:
Apple Black Friday deals continue to pour in across every product line, but these M4 Max MacBook Pro discounts are especially enticing thanks to record-breaking price drops.

Every 2024 MacBook Pro is on sale, but there are two configurations in particular that are especially attractive due to their high-performance upgrades and staggering $400 price cuts.

The first is the 14-inch model in Space Black. Marked down to $2,799 after at $400 instant rebate at both Amazon and Best Buy, this configuration has an upgrade to Apple's M4 Max chip with a 14-core CPU and 32-core GPU. Memory comes in at 36GB and the laptop has a good amount of storage at 1TB.

  • 14" M4 Max, 14C CPU, 32C GPU, 36GB, 1TB, Space Black: $2,799 ($400 off) at Amazon and Best Buy
  • 16" M4 Max, 16C CPU, 40C GPU, 48GB, 1TB: $3,599 ($400 off) at Amazon and Best Buy

The next configuration is the 16-inch MacBook Pro with Apple's top-of-the-line M4 Max chip featuring a 16-core CPU and 40-core GPU. A great option for content creators, the system has 48GB of RAM and 1TB of storage. Both Space Black and Silver are eligible for the substantial $400 discount and units are in stock with delivery set for early December to most locations.

If sticking to a budget is a priority, you can find Black Friday deals on every configuration in our Mac Price Guide, with prices starting at $1,399 across the M4 range.
